description: Rows of triangle formed using Pascal's rule except we begin and end the n-th row with n-2.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n=0..100 of triangle, flattened
Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
formula: -t(n,k)=((2*k + 1 - n)/(k + 1))*Binomial[n, k] + ((1 - n + 2 (-k + n))/(1 - k + n)) Binomial[n, -k + n]. [From _Roger L. Bagula_, Feb 17 2009]
